Actions.Name: Justice Fist
Actions.Effect: Foe is branded. Shove 3 against branded characters.

Actions.Name: Seal
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 takes 1 piercing damage. If that character attacks before the end of their next turn, they take [D] piercing damage and this effect ends.

Actions.Name: Shrine of Sanctuary
Actions.Description: Summon a height 1 shrine object (10 HP, attacks automatically hit). While adjacent to the shrine allies have resistance.
